model.core

Interface Layerable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlackAndWhite, Blur, ColorShift, Contrast, Crop, Edge, Exposure, GaussianBlur, Grain, GrayScale, HMirroring, Levels, NewKernel, RotateL, RotateR, Sharpen, TextFilter, WhiteBalance, VMirroring

    public interface Layerable
    Interface common for all filters
